issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: When ORC-380 that adds the SchemaEvolution.isOnlyImplicitConversion call is available in the ORC release used by Apache master (and branch-3), then update LlapRecordReader (see comments in HIVE-19951 change).
fields.summary: Vectorization: Follow-on to HIVE-19951 --> add call to SchemaEvolution.isOnlyImplicitConversion to disable encoded LLAP I/O for ORC only when data type conversion is not implicit
